channel.title: RuneScate BETA - F2P/P2P Coming soon
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]Runescate BETA F2P[/B][/SIZE]
(green) is 100 % complete (red) is not added (yellow) added but not 100%
[size=24pt][url=http://runescapebeta.createaforum.com/index.php]FORUM[/url][/size]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120426145847/runescape/images/9/9d/Melee-icon.png[/img] [b]Skills :[/b]
Attack Strenght Defence Magic Prayer Range Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Runecrafting Crafting
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220331/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Locations :[/b]
Lumbridge Falador Varrock Al-Kharid Draynor Village Rimmington Karamja Island Port Sarim Edgevillage Barbarian Village Willderness
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [B]Dungeons :[/B]
Varrock dungeons Draynor dungeon Karamja dungeon Port Sarim dungeon
[B]Other : [/B]
Cooking Guild Mining Guild Random events 8+ free quests Different location music & sounds
[B]Need to be added :[/B]
Duel arena More quests Add more stairs and ladders
Donator Amulet (Double exp) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKwwBio.png[/img]

item.title: RuneScate BETA - F2P/P2P Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @dimaskas dimaskas
item.description:
@dimaskas wrote:

rs2007 is not free you have to pay to play , there is 2 free worlds even though there is almost no one playing . What about my server , it is f2p and adding p2p content now , so it will get p2p free server .

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScate BETA - F2P/P2P Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

eclipse rsps:

I dont understand these kinds of projects anymore, Jagex has opened 2007 server’s so I dont see the point in these types of projects anymore. Just my two cents.

i dont think rs2007 is for f2p is it? I havent gone on rs for so long

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScate BETA - F2P/P2P Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @dimaskas dimaskas
item.description:
@dimaskas wrote:

eclipse rsps:

I dont understand these kinds of projects anymore, Jagex has opened 2007 server’s so I dont see the point in these types of projects anymore. Just my two cents.

because even though it is released , ppl still prefer high exp rates and etc , also , this is not 100% remake , watch runecrafting i added , in my view it is much better than a usual runecrafting .
